name: deimosrising
text: I'm picking up some good vibrations from this strip! Ba-dump ching!

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, Lolsworth, UntilYouAreSoNude, Overmedicated, NotGodot, mortshire, stevegt500, Koremora, MortisInvictus, JuanCarlos, fakedaisies, theplaidknight, suprememongoose, nutmeg, clembot)

name: catachresis
text: Except for the drew one

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lolsworth, NotGodot, plummet, riste, fakedaisies, holly_golightly)

name: ovenface
text: I think it's kind of unfair to judge guest strips by the same criteria as the real ones. Some of these folks have rad strips. It's much more difficult to do a strip in a style of such as not your own.

name: rowboat
text: You make a good point.

name: cryabetes
text: A comment left by cryabetes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by daidai, riotdejaneiro, songbirdspectre, equinn2006, Baryonyx, Tragic_Johnson, clintisiceman, AmonRunsAmok)

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, GeyserShitdick, Baryonyx, Afkpuz, dracer2, SenseiHollywood, SPECTRE)

name: afkpuz
text:
Brian Wilson: "Arp"

Genius.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: The way I see this, this is all a grand scheme concocted by LieBot to get Phillipe to witness a fake murder. How he got everyone to go along with it, I'll never know.

name: wittyname
text: I originally read this as everyone getting in on an elaborate play on Phillipe that everyone was in on, but then... I have no idea where the end came from.

name: dicklaurent
text: He Lied to them

name: paco
text: no, everyone was in to set it up for Phillipe, much like they set that TV show thing up for Beef (I can't remember what it was or find it). Then Ray got drunk and passed out in the back room, and Liebot saw a chance to scar Phillipe just a little bit more.

name: radchillies
text: but then how do you explain the title. "Los Angeles, California, 1971"? If Phillipe will always be 5 years old, isn't it safe to assume he's been 5 for a while now?

name: behka
text: this one is definitely underrated. but i do love SGR. two greats that make an awesome.

name: rustmouth
text: But shouldn't Beef be Brian wilson?

name: ham_shoes
text: He should be Scott Walker

name: gumfish
text: ooooo-k-a-a-a-y

name: gopacapulco
text: only beach boys fans would understand this. hmmph

name: _cheesekayke
text: I dunno. I think it's fairly common knowledge that Manson was friends with the Beach Boys for a long time. At least if you're morbid.

name: soupkaty
text: john allison rocks. i had totally forgotten who was manson here. so great.

name: comrade_tom
text:
Everytime he closes his eyes....
Lies
... Lies

name: heccibiggs
text:
Achewood and The Arcade Fire are two of my favourite things, but I would never mix them.

Like mayo and peanut butter.

name: comrade_tom
text: Suppose so. Charles manson mixed mass murder and Beatles lyrics...his two favourites, that didnt end too well.

name: anzio
text: You could probably write some pretty metal songs out of his lyrics.

name: hrm
text: what is that Pet Sounds font used on the sign and around the panels??

name: edwell
text: Everything you ever wanted to know about... Cooper Black

name: johnnyrocker
text:
What would be terrific is if Dresden Codak did an Achewood guest strip.

Actually that would be really fucked up.

name: zapatos
text: No man it would be terrific, you had it right the first time.

name: hawaiian_robot
text: Come on, this should be a little bit higher than 3.2

name: troy_convers
text: Easily the best of the guest strips so far. Well observed.

name: furge
text: Pat is Mike Love because Pat is an asshole.  That made a lot of sense to me.

name: hawaiian_robot
text: Damn you, I wanted to post this. Still liked Ray being Dennis, though.

name: enough_talk
text: Amazing that he correlated Phillipe with the Beach Boys in the first place.

name: mashisoyo
text: 1971? Nope. Other than that I like this strip quite a bit.
